issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Install latest version
Unplug attached iOS device
Plug in other device

I have reinstalled Titanium. I unplugged and replugged in the phone multiple times. The device shows in XCode no problem, but Titanium never changes.

h3. Actual Result
list never changes

h3. Expected Result
list should show current attached device
fields.summary: Device list under run iOS devices will not update

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "*Device list under run iOS devices*" in Appcelerator Studio is working fine for me. I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126 and TiSDK 4.1.0 GA .

I recommend you try *refresh studio (File>refresh or f5)* when plug or unplug an iOS device . 
I will mark this ticket as "*resolved*" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
